Protocols/VITSessionManagerDelegate.html.name: didRegainNetworkConnectionForSession(session:)

Protocols/VITSessionManagerDelegate.html.name: didLoseNetworkConnectionForSession(session:)
Protocols/VITSessionManagerDelegate.html.abstract: Informs the delegate that reachability is lost for the session. This guarantees no network operations

Protocols/VITSessionManagerDelegate.html.abstract: A session has been lost. This can either happen when returning the app to foreground and detecting an

Protocols/VITSessionManagerDelegate.html.name: didCompleteLogin(session:)
Protocols/VITSessionManagerDelegate.html.abstract: User has completed the login flow succesfully and is now logged in.

Protocols/VITSessionManagerDelegate.html.name: didRefreshSession(session:)

Enums/VITSessionManagerErrorCode.html#/c.name: invalidAppDelegateError
Enums/VITSessionManagerErrorCode.html#/c.abstract: The app’s AppDelegate is not compliant with VITMobileSSO. The AppDelegate must implement

Enums/VITSessionManagerErrorCode.html#/c.name: serviceConfigLoadError
Enums/VITSessionManagerErrorCode.html#/c.abstract: The service configuration could not be loaded.

Enums/VITSessionManagerErrorCode.html#/c.name: tokenRequestError
Enums/VITSessionManagerErrorCode.html#/c.abstract: Token exchange request could not be created. This indicates a bug in VITMobileSSO framework.

Enums/VITSessionManagerErrorCode.html#/c.name: sessionRefreshNoSessionError
Enums/VITSessionManagerErrorCode.html#/c.abstract: The session could not be refreshed because no session exists.

Enums/VITSessionManagerErrorCode.html#/c.name: sessionRefreshOauthError
Enums/VITSessionManagerErrorCode.html#/c.abstract: The server rejected the refresh token. The refresh token is most probably expired.

Enums/VITSessionManagerErrorCode.html#/c.name: sessionRefreshNetworkError
Enums/VITSessionManagerErrorCode.html#/c.abstract: Network error occurred (e.g. no internet connection) while refreshing the session.

Enums/VITSessionManagerErrorCode.html#/c.name: sessionRefreshServerError
Enums/VITSessionManagerErrorCode.html#/c.abstract: Server returned an error while refreshing the session. This might indicate a server issue.

Enums/VITSessionManagerErrorCode.html#/c.name: logoutErrorNoEndSessionURL
Enums/VITSessionManagerErrorCode.html#/c.abstract: The service configuration did not contain an URL for ending the session.

Enums/VITSessionManagerErrorCode.html#/c.name: logoutErrorNetworkError
Enums/VITSessionManagerErrorCode.html#/c.abstract: Network error occurred (e.g. no internet connection) while trying to log out.

Enums/VITSessionManagerErrorCode.html#/c.name: logoutErrorServerError
Enums/VITSessionManagerErrorCode.html#/c.abstract: Server returned an error while logging out. This might indicate a server issue.

Enums/VITSessionStatus.html#/c:@M@Mobile.name: expired
Enums/VITSessionStatus.html#/c:@M@Mobile.abstract: The session has expired and needs refresh.
